name: Zabbix
description: Zabbix is an all-in-one monitoring solution with a variety of enterprise-grade features available right out of the box.

notes.text: You can choose between Zabbix agent (classic) and agent2 (modern) during installation
For agent2 the PostgreSQL plugin is installed by default; all plugins are optional
If agent2 with NVIDIA plugin is installed in an environment without GPU, the installer disables it automatically
